text:
Python/Django/Backend - plecto.com - Aarhus, Denmark

Plecto is motivation platform for sales staff and customer service agents. We visualise performance through real-time dashboards and notifications.

We're looking for another developer to join our team of currently three people. You care al to about quality of code, consistency, uptime and you really love what you're doing!

Send me an email at kristian@plecto.com - I'm the founder and also a developer - check my github (github.com/KristianOellegaard) :-)
